---
title: "R Workshop"
---

This website is developed for the Workshop on **Data Analysis with R for Biomedical Researchers** organized by the Department of Community and Family Medicine, All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Bhopal. This website will host the workshop resource materials.

First workshop is scheduled on **11-14 Oct 2022.**
